reviews.author: Mike A.
reviews.review: I'd give zero if I could. The mgmt staff here is very unprofessional and do things that should get them fired, from screaming at tenants to keeping the fitness room closed while health department isn't requiring it. They selectively enforce rules ( I see dogs off leash all the time, I went out after waking up to let my dog go to the bathroom for 3 minutes, not a walk, and the old lady screamed at me from across the street, then sent a notice to comply or vacate threat which is supposed to come after 3 warnings). I hate moving but may consider leaving after the 1st year just because of the office staff. Maintenance is nice and on their tasks, A+ for them. Parking is a nightmare. The units to the right of the complex (which I reside in) are old and not well kept, but come with a higher price (although lower than new construction). The unit was dirty when I moved in and had to deep clean it myself, even though they will charge me a cleaning fee when I move and not clean the apt again. Pretty slummy actions on just the mgmt staffs end Location is great, could be a nice complex with competent mgmt.

reviews.author: Raphael G.

reviews.author: Lisa W.
reviews.review:
Lived here 5 years, always paid the rent and bills on time,  never asked the management for anything except once to repair the broken washing machine...the washer - dryer unit finally got replaced with an older one after more than a month with no washer-dryer.. Didn't complain and just used it when I finally got it. I have been a homeowner and a landlord myself ... I cleaned the place conscientiously and thoroughly when I moved out, did not damage anything, including the walls, but still got charged a $125 cleaning and painting fee. (in addition to the deep carpet cleaning fee which was an expected cost).  When asked to explain the cleaning fee, the current manager was rude, disrespectful and nitpicking. In retrospect I should not have even bothered to take such time and care cleaning the unit before I left, since there was no appreciation expressed and they only look for ways to keep your money however they can. Not impressed. Bad management and interpersonal skills. My car was broken into, parked in front of my unit, and things were stolen... after reporting it to the management, they agreed to notify the other tenants, but they did nothing. 
Don't expect to get back your security deposit and don't expect to be treated in a courteous or professional manner if you ever have to ask the management about anything at this complex. So glad to have moved out and bought my own place now. I hope the manager learns some management skills and how to be courteous with people. And lesson learned: don't bother cleaning the unit when you move out because you won't get your rightful security deposit back, anyway.

reviews.author: Paige N.
reviews.review:
Not sure what all the bad reviews are about. I've lived here for just about 9 months so I haven't gone through a lease renewal but so far this place has been awesome. Management has been great and super friendly and helped out with any issues or questions I've had in a timely manner. Maintenance requests have always been taken care of either same day or the next day as long as it's not on a weekend (I imagine they would tend to urgent issues on the weekend too). The maintenance guy is super friendly and always cracking jokes and says hello anytime you pass him by.
I really love the apartment because there's hardly any freeway noise, the unit and deck are both very spacious, the place has a nice view, it's a very central location to Bellingham, parking has never been an issue and its affordable for Bellingham prices. Of course issues can arise when either ending a lease or renewing so I'll update if that's the case but I really don't imagine having any issues considering how great it's been so far.

reviews.author: Patience M.
reviews.review: Management is the worst here that I have ever seen. They do not care about anybody except themselves, they close down the office whenever without telling anybody, they send back your packages without warning you, and they do not care for your safety or wellbeing. During my time living at Village, they tried to increase my rent mid-lease and when I asked them about it they refused to fix the lease, reduce my rent, told me I was wrong and that if I don't pay it that I'll be late on rent and will have to pay added fees. Told management I knew my legal rights and they better fix this, so they agreed to look into it and get back to me. They never got back to me and forced me to hunt them down, again, and when I finally got ahold of somebody they told me they were wrong and it was illegal for them to try to do that. They also took over 2 weeks to fix my washing machine, same deal with my dryer when it broke, they try to charge you for others not following the rules, but when you go to report issues (such as being harassed by neighbors because they're drunk and disorderly) management refuses to do anything about it. This management is the sleaziest, sketchiest, careless bunch of people I have ever met. Rent at your own risk, do not recommend it here.
